@appShortName.description: The short-version name of the extension name

@appDesc.message: See previews of links and instantly performs searches on the same page using this previewer instead of opening new tabs

@testMarkup.message:
Hello world

This is the language of the web

The_search_engine_that_would_be_used_for.message: The search engine that would be used for inline search previews.

The_width_of_the_preview_panel_relative_.message: The width of the preview panel relative to the page.

The_height_of_the_preview_panel_relative.message: The height of the preview panel relative to the page.

The_side_of_the_page_in_which_to_display.message: The side of the page in which to display the preview.

Use_the_ESC__escape__key_to_close_the_pr.message: Use the ESC (escape) key to close the preview panel.

Hides_the_preview_panel_when_you_scroll_.message: Hides the preview panel when you scroll away or interact with the main page.

Displays_the_view_in_Chrome_Side_Panel_i.message: Displays the view in Chrome Side Panel instead of a floating box.

When_automatic_preview_on_hover_is_enabl.message: When automatic preview on hover is enabled, this is the delay before the preview is shown.

For_websites_that___really___do_not_want.message: For websites that **really** do not want to be previewed (e.g. stackoverflow.com) this forces a preview. Nerd alert: this is a frame-busting buster.

By_default__the_version_of_Google_search.message: By default, the version of Google search used is always signed-out for privacy and security reasons. Though this may result in always seeing sign-in prompts.

The_detail_information_about_the_checkbo.message: The detail information about the checkbox here.

Extension_will_not_run_on_these_sites__y.message: Extension will not run on these sites, you can disable a site by adding to this list.
